------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Order of Abatement and Remediation - 8/23/2021](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/index.asp?SEC=95BE0A88-417D-47EE-8E55-2F2624C520F3&DE=16CB3382-F24B-491F-9CCD-C455644C0B2B)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[EFV Notification](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/index.asp?SEC=95BE0A88-417D-47EE-8E55-2F2624C520F3&DE=29674AA8-DA57-4C79-88F1-AD54F74EB0DD)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beginning April14, 2017 a new Federal Regulation requires all natural gas utilities to notify customers regarding the availability of excess flow valves (EFV).  You may request that the City of Woodville install an excess flow valve (EFV) on the gas line to your property. For more information, please click the link below.

[Excess Flow Valve Notice](http://www.woodville-tx.gov/vertical/sites/%7B5E66A38A-188A-4196-A941-D6529818A788%7D/uploads/Wdv-EFV-Notification-Letter_.pdf)

[Section 504 Policy and Grievance Procedures](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/index.asp?SEC=95BE0A88-417D-47EE-8E55-2F2624C520F3&DE=8B6CED67-621D-4075-9DE3-EA3A33F7BC33)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The City of Woodville does not discriminate on the basis of handicap in admission or access to, or treatment or employment in, its federally assisted programs and activities.

![Fair Housing Statement](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/vertical/Sites/%7B5E66A38A-188A-4196-A941-D6529818A788%7D/uploads/FH_Statement.gif)

[Fair Housing](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/index.asp?SEC=95BE0A88-417D-47EE-8E55-2F2624C520F3&DE=17779F39-E7F5-4024-A360-42C8C1610517)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It is the policy of the City of Woodville to comply with all applicable laws relating to Civil Rights and to conduct business in accordance with the Federal Fair Housing Law.


![Woodville, TX](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/repository/designs/templates/GO_woodville-tx_2024_resp/images/title.png)
400 W. Bluff Street Woodville, Texas 75979
Ph. (409) 283-2234 Fax (409) 283-8412

#### Contact Us

Hours 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Monday - Friday (closed noon -12:30 p.m. for lunch)
If you are in need of assistance after hours and on weekends call (409) 283-2172
